projects.title: Transaction Categorizer
projects.description: ML pipeline for intelligent bank transaction categorization using HuggingFace sentence transformers and KNN classification. Dynamically adapts and learns from new transaction patterns to achieve prediction accuracy across diverse financial categories.

projects.title: Pokemon Air Force 1's
projects.description: Built with Python, uses Selenium to navigate the Nike website and build Air Force One's inspired by the color palette of any pokemon!

projects.title: My JSON Portfolio v1.0
projects.description: My personal website! Hosted from PythonAnywhere, uses a Django Backend and the Bootstrap UI.

projects.title: Quantified Self Dashboard
projects.description: Built with React, this simple dashboard displays useful statistics collected from a smart scale! My goal was to create an interface that can keep users motivated by showing them the "big picture" of their day to day health progress!

projects.title: Minesweeper AI (CS50AI)
projects.description: A simple Minesweeper AI that uses logical induction to solve a Minesweeper puzzle. This project was completed as a part of Harvard CS50's Introduction to Artificial Intelligence with Python.

projects.title: My Git-JSON Resume
projects.description: Using the open source project, JSON Resume, I created a Github Repository with Github Actions that let's you version control the information on your resume. The project generates pdfs and html files in over 250+ themes, which can be posted online using Github Pages!

projects.title: ArgoCD AppSource Controller
projects.description: A decentralized manager for ArgoCD Applications hosted on a kubernetes cluster â€” allows sub-admins to create and manage their own applications on the ArgoCD platform.

projects.title: WhatTimeISSIt
projects.description: ISS Tracker for Apple Watch - A simple app that displays the real-time location of the International Space Station using a custom 3D wireframe globe visualization. Features real-time API integration with oscilloscope-style aesthetics.

projects.title: Dynatab75x Controller
projects.description: A CLI tool to interact with an Epomaker Dynatab75x keyboard that comes with a small 60x9 pixel screen. Features include uploading images to the screen, sending custom text, and controlling backlight settings. Built with Python and supports USB connections.
